title: THE BEARS / Adrian Belew / 2LP / 1987-88
description:
Robert Steven Belew aka Adrian (1949- )  facilitated excellent music with Zappa, 

Bowie and King Crimson.  



These 2 vinyl rips are of the first BEARS LPs with former Cincinnati based band

members of THE RAISINS



Be assured that all inherent clicks and pops have been reproduced faithfully 

in .flac           RISE AND SHINE is the cleaner of the 2 vinyl LP's



tracks #5 and 6 on Rise and Shine (1988) are combined and appear in CD text as

track #5 : Nobody's Fool / Highway 2
